content: Experienced Graduate Research Assistant with a demonstrated history of working in the higher education industry. Skilled in Physics, Linux, Python, Abinit, Mathematica, and Fortran. Strong education professional working toward a Doctor of Philosophy (Ph.D.) focused in Physics from University of Missouri-Columbia.
